name: Space Aliens Are Coming
description:
Space Aliens Are Coming

Made for Ludum Dare 38

Shoot down invading aliens before they abduct your workers. You need them to launch the missile that will destroy the alien mothership.

Controls:

* A/D or Arrow Keys to move around the planet

* Aim with mouse - Click to shoot

* ESC to return to main menu

* Spacebar to launch missile
